summary: Adds a New Medieval Style Village Outside Solitude
descriptionHtml:
Hey all :)

This mod adds a New Medieval Style Village Outside Solitude Inspired by The Witcher. I made this mode Because I felt the outside of Solitude was unbelievably empty. The buildings are from another mod called Syerscote. Made by the Great [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4286516]samv96UK[/url]. If it wasn't for him/her giving me permission to use his meshes, I wouldn't have been able to Post this mod at all! Thanks again man! :)

The features of this mod are:

- An Entirely new Town outside solitude.
- New Entrance leading into Solitude. Walk the the Lower class of Solitude then Enter the Upper Class.
- New NPC's that have their daily and Night time activities. (They are still currently called "Prisoner" I will Rename them soon)
- A new Tavern called "the Lazy Horse Inn" that the NPC's go to at night time. (still needs a Barman) 
- New crowd sounds for the town and tavern (Currently having issues with the sounds not turning off at night.)

There is currently no collision on the buildings, so you can walk through them. :/ I will fix this by adding collision markers.

Future Plans

- Create shops
- Named NPC's
- Make all houses enterable
- Tweaks

OF course there are bugs. And i plan on fixing them ASAP. I have spent many hours creating this mod so please go easy :)

ENB used in the mod is "T.A.Z Visual Overhaul" Very underrated ENB 

- Credits

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4286516]samv96UK

[/url]- Bethesda

- History
author: Tomolyons
